<h3 id="X11509">X(11509)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE AND INNER-YFF TANGENTS</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (a^3-(b+c)*a^2-(b^2+c^2)*a+(b+c)^3)*a/(-a+b+c)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11509) = R*(R+r)*X(1)-r*(R-r)*X(3)</b>
<p>X(11509) lies on these lines:{1,3}, {4,10958}, {6,1195}, {11,6833}, {12,377}, {21,1788}, {25,1887}, {34,11383}, {41,2272}, {42,603}, {43,1935}, {73,1406}, {100,388}, {109,386}, {119,6917}, {145,8668}, {197,10834}, {201,4414}, {221,4255}, {222,2594}, {404,3485}, {411,3474}, {442,4413}, {474,11375}, {478,2092}, {480,2057}, {497,6890}, {608,4261}, {958,5554}, {993,4848}, {1001,5433}, {1012,1837}, {1013,1940}, {1035,8614}, {1106,2177}, {1118,4219}, {1158,1858}, {1393,4332}, {1436,2259}, {1444,5933}, {1450,3915}, {1455,4646}, {1478,10942}, {1593,1875}, {1621,7288}, {1709,1898}, {1737,3560}, {1770,6985}, {1816,5327}, {1836,3149}, {1877,4185}, {2003,5312}, {2171,2178}, {3035,5555}, {3085,6897}, {3086,6977}, {3434,10530}, {3476,3871}, {3486,6909}, {3614,6984}, {3649,10940}, {3911,5248}, {3913,10944}, {4256,10571}, {4292,6796}, {4293,10805}, {4294,6899}, {4295,6905}, {4383,7299}, {4421,5434}, {4423,7483}, {4428,5298}, {5252,5687}, {5432,6889}, {5794,6735}, {6147,10044}, {6284,6836}, {6600,8581}, {6831,10896}, {6860,7173}, {6934,7354}, {7294,8167}, {7702,11517}, {8715,10106}, {10785,10959}, {10803,11490}, {10878,11494}, {10929,11497}, {10930,11498}, {11112,11237}</p>
<p>
X(11509) = reflection of X(10966) in X(8071)<br>
X(11509) = orthocenter of cross-triangle of Mandart-incircle and anti-Mandart-incircle triangle<br>
X(11509) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,1470,56), (1,11248,55), (3,65,56), (3,3295,3612), (3,11507,55), (55,56,11510), (55,1466,56), (56,3303,1388), (56,5217,5172), (65,1155,1454), (100,388,11501), (388,10528,10956)<br>
</p>
